starting_location.plaintext: Weeping Willow of the Lake , Fontaine

steps.plaintext: Search for the "key" near the "Weeping Willow"
steps.markdown: Search for the "key" near the "Weeping Willow"

steps.plaintext: Find a way to activate the altar
steps.markdown: Find a way to activate the altar

substeps.plaintext: Use the Xenochromatic Hunter's Ray's ability to cut the Fontemer Seagrass and free the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus.
substeps.markdown: Use the ◀Xenochromatic Hunter's Ray▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Xenochromatic_Hunter%27s_Ray▷'s ability to cut the ◀Fontemer Seagrass▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Fontemer_Seagrass▷ and free the ◀Xenochromatic Ball Octopus▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Xenochromatic_Ball_Octopus▷.

substeps.plaintext: Use the Ball Octopus' ability to destroy the Contaminated Bacterial Mats near the altar, which reveals a Dew Bubble.
substeps.markdown: Use the Ball Octopus' ability to destroy the ◀Contaminated Bacterial Mats▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Contaminated_Bacterial_Mat▷ near the altar, which reveals a ◀Dew Bubble▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dew_Bubble▷.

substeps.plaintext: Solve the Harmonious Reed Pipe puzzle.

steps.plaintext: Examine the item on the altar
steps.markdown: Examine the item on the altar
